1.content: Analyze existing Invoice Pro subscription system
1.details:
1. Examine the current Invoice Pro codebase structure
2. Identify subscription management components
3. Review user authentication and storage implementation
4. Understand current subscription validation logic
5. Analyze cancellation functionality for monthly/yearly plans

2.content: Create comprehensive test suite for Invoice Pro subscriptions
2.details:
1. Test user registration and credential storage
2. Test subscription creation (monthly/yearly)
3. Test subscription status validation
4. Test subscription cancellation scenarios
5. Test edge cases and error handling
6. Create automated test scripts

3.details:
1. Run tests for new user addition with credentials
2. Test subscription enrollment for both plan types
3. Verify subscription validation functionality
4. Test cancellation workflows
5. Document test results and any issues found
